mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counselingdetail_t(sf_idx, cd_date, cd_name, cd_phone, c_idx, ct_idx, cd_result, cd_personalNum, cd_cardType, cd_card, cd_nextDate, cd_address, cd_inflowPath, cd_subject, cd_status2 ) values(#{sf_idx}, #{cd_date}, #{cd_name}, #{cd_phone}, #{c_idx}, #{ct_idx}, #{cd_result}, #{cd_personalNum}, #{cd_cardType}, #{cd_card}, #{cd_nextDate}, #{cd_address}, #{cd_inflowPath}, #{cd_subject}, 0)
